ds_priority_clear: With this function you can clear all data from the given priority queue data-structure. This does NOT destroy the data-structure (for that you should use ds_priority_destroy()) it only wipes all data from it and returns an empty priority queue.
The id of the data structure to clear.

The above code checks a variable to see if it has reached a specific value and if it has it clears the DS priority queue indexed in the variable "command_queue", sets an alarm, and resets the variable to 0.
